q.quote: I rarely drink, I don't smoke, so my vice is probably creating. I'm addicted to creating. And women.
q.author: Andre Benjamin

q.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
q.author: Andre Gide

q.quote: To be witty is not enough. One must possess sufficient wit to avoid having too much of it.
q.author: Andre Maurois

q.quote: Singing provides a true sense of lightheartedness. If I sing when I am alone, I feel wonderful. It's freedom.
q.author: Andrea Bocelli

q.quote: Childbearing is glorified in part because women die from it.
q.author: Andrea Dworkin

q.quote: If you don't practice, you don't deserve to win.
q.author: Andre Agassi

q.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
q.author: Andre Gide

q.quote: I think that 99 percent of the time, I'm jocular, lighthearted.
q.author: Andrew Breitbart

q.quote: You cannot push any one up a ladder unless he be willing to climb a little himself.
q.author: Andrew Carnegie

q.quote: The more you worry, the more you throw off the delicate balance of hormones required for health.
q.author: Andrew J.Bernstein

q.quote: Take time to deliberate; but when the time for action arrives, stop thinking and go in.
q.author: Andrew Jackson

q.quote: Slavery exists. It is black in the South, and white in the North.
q.author: Andrew Johnson

q.quote: Superstar was made so early in my career I had nothing to do with it at all. The first time I saw it was the opening screening.
q.author: Andrew Lloyd Webber

q.quote: The pen and the written word hold a great deal of power.
q.author: Andy Biersack

q.quote: I'm cautious about using fire. It can become theatrical. I am interested in the heat, not the flames.
q.author: Andy Goldsworthy
